definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[שׁלח]] (√ of foll.; Ar. slalxa strip off hide, sula0xah;un piece of hide stripped off; Aram. [[שְׁלַח]], 4lah. take off garment; Ar. salxun, Aram. [[שִׁלְחָא]], salut.a hide, perh. also Palm. [[שלחא]] (pl. ? Lzb; Reckend:ZMG xiii (1888), 415 cp. I. [[שֶׁלַח]]); hence [[שֻׁלְחָן]], q. v. (also NH Ecclus), v. GFM:PAOS 1890, ixx; esp. Ju Jdg 1:7).
